entry.title: Operation: Sleep Well, Destroy Better
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,191Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Clark Kent's marriage to Bruce Wayne threw him straight into the chaos of the Batfam—a den of chronic insomnia and neglected self-care. Determined to enforce at least a bare minimum of healthy routine, Clark declared war on sleepless nights and diets of pure black coffee.Some accepted the changes reluctantly. But Tim Drake? Tim was a whole other challenge.After countless failed attempts to convince him to take better care of himself, Clark decided to fight dirty. The offer? 90 days of regulated sleep and less coffee in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity—to humiliate Lex Luthor.Now, the looming question: Will Tim hold up his end of the deal, or will his work obsession (and caffeine addiction) sabotage his own revenge?

entry.title: In Shadows We Bind Our Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: RaineKellen64

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,271Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 120

Summary: The Batkids are stuck in a time loop where Bruce sacrifices himself to save them every time. Once they break the time loop, nothing is going to stop them from keeping their dad safe, even from himself.OrThe consequences of losing your dad one too many times.OrI love platonic yandere and overprotective Batkids, so I wrote it.-----------------------I have barely read any Batman comics, but I've read a boat load of fanfiction of them. They are OOC.P.S. There is no time line. The title is temporary. This is only my second fic.

entry.title: Days of Winters Past
entry.summary:
Author: kitfornow

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,123Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 335

Summary: The day before Christmas Eve, Scarecrow develops a new toxin that traps Bruce, Clark, and Jason in Bruce’s memories. Each have an icy relationship at best, but it seems the only way out, is through.Nothing like the past, and the winter, to make for a warmer future.

entry.title: Kitten: Year 16, Meeting the Batfamily
entry.summary:
Author: Dominant_Abomination

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,314Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Izakk is the Son of Catwoman and Batman. He's been staying out of Batman's sight for sixteen years, not wanting to end up how being a sidekick of Batman usually does. He's happy and content staying by his Mama's side as Kitten, her thieving sidekick. What happens when he's discovered soon after his sixteenth birthday? He knows one thing, he's NOT putting on fucking boy shorts.

entry.summary:
Author: Mrswas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,656Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 152

Summary: Bruce and Damian are taken by the League of Assassins. Bruce must do what he can to keep his son safe, even if it includes letting Talia have what she wants from him, mentally and physically.Also, the timeline and ages are slightly different than canon:League training at 17Talia drugs him at 22Damian is born when he is 23, he gets Damian at 30. Dick adopted at 8 when bruce is 19. Jason comes to the manor when hes 10 and Bruce is 25. Tim a couple years later (early adoption). Duke adopted at 12, Cass at 14, Steph at 14. Current agesBruce 33Dick 22Jason 18Tim 16Duke 14Damian 10Cass 17Oracle 23Steph 16

Escape, clothes burnt and singed, exhausted and hungry as fuck.Nothing looks familiar, then again the last time Derek was outside he was in Brazil enjoying a drink while on a assignment, and now he is in a depressing city with an interesting choice of architecture.and are those gunshots in the distance....

entry.summary:
Author: TheStoryTeller_with_an_Eyepatch

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,648Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 104

Summary: After the events of Trimax, Vash's sisters think their little brother needs a change of scenery.A few universes and almost a thousand years in the past, Gotham's narrows experiences a supernatural power surge that had the potential to blackout the entire city.Gotham's Bat is watching, and our favorite Typhoon finds that a brand new world means brand new problems and brand new people to save.

entry.title: Dome Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: DeaPotteriana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,926Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 140

Summary: “I think he created the device for an end-of-the-world scenario,” Bruce said, voice carefully neutral.***The future children of Gotham’s Batkids appear in the cave out of thin air, pulled from their time in a flash of light. Now trapped in a dome with their family watching from the outside, they'll have to face a heart-breaking possibility.AKAThe Batkids’ own kids get unknowingly sent to the past and the original Batfam can do nothing but watch.- - - -Currently working on a second chapter.

entry.title: Dynamic Duo
entry.summary:
Author: RiptideUnstruck

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,128Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 695

Summary: In some way, they invariably knew that Dick Grayson was the apple of Bruce’s eye. The first Robin, his first son. Alfred had always said that if it weren’t for Dick, Bruce Wayne would’ve imploded.Dick regresses back to nine years old and the bat clan finally sees who was Bruce Wayne’s first best friend.Spoiler: Batman is suddenly making puns and its giving everyone an aneurysm.
